thread.title: Thrilling circus show heads to Southampton
thread.title_full: Thrilling circus show heads to Southampton

title: Thrilling circus show heads to Southampton
text:
0 comments 
DIRECT from five sold-out seasons in London’s Hyde Park Winter Wonderland and two packed-out theatre tours, Britain’s popular contemporary thrill circus Cirque Berserk will visit Southampton . 
Following the huge success of Cirque Berserk on its two initial tours, the latest production will come to the Mayflower Theatre for the first time ever from February 29 to March 2 next year. 
Combining contemporary “cirque” style skills with off-the-scale thrilling stunt action, Cirque Berserk is a danger-filled spectacle that will amaze audiences of all ages. 
Presenting the world’s most dangerous circus act, the legendary Globe of Terror, with 3 motorcyclists speeding at over 60mph inside a steel cage will be seen for the first time live on stage in the UK. The Daily Telelgraph called this: “off the scale awesome.” 
The circus also boasts a troupe of over thirty jugglers, acrobats, aerialists, dancers, musicians and death-defying stunt men, joined by award-winning physical comedian Tweedy (“The best Clown I have ever seen” – The Guardian). Share article 
Mayflower Box Office 02380 711811 
PLEASE NOTE that the name is Cirque Berserk , NOT ‘BESERK’, ‘BEZERK’, or ‘BERZERK’. Promoted Stories Thrilling circus show heads to Southampton
